decision_conditions: T.1 Turkey Oak - Holistic crown reduction to previous points only, 10% crown thin & deadwood.T.2 English Oak - Holistic crown reduction to previous points only, 10% crown thin & deadwood.G.3 Elm x2 - 2-3m Lateral reduction to property boundary. T.4 Holly - 2-3m Lateral reduction to property boundary.
description: T.1 Turkey Oak - 2-3m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points below most recent previous reduction points. Remove two lowest limbs at 8m & 9m growing to west from major crown stem to north west. Thin crown by 10-15% and deadwood. T.2 English Oak - 2-3m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points below most recent previous reduction points. Remove lowest limb at 7m growing to west from major crown stem to north west. Thin crown by 10-15% and deadwood.G.3 Elm x2 - 2-3m Lateral reduction to property boundary. T.4 Holly - 2-3m Lateral reduction to property boundary.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
